results.title: This life
results.brief_description: ‘This life’ - the series following the life and loves of twenty something solicitors, Anna, Miles, Milly, Egg and Warren earned itself a legion of loyal fans when it originally screened in 1997. Series devised by Amy Jenkins.

results.title: Blanking and piercing
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “How to form aluminium”.
US Army Air Force training film. Shows step by stp factory demonstration of punch and die operations on aluminium blanks including the different methods of hand feeding and mechanical feeding.
results.description:

results.title: Spinning
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “How to form aluminium”.
Training film covering the different spinning processes used in forming aluminium. Shows factory floor demonstration of shaping techniques step by step with a recap of essentials.
results.description:

results.title: Tube and shape binding
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “How to form aluminium”.
Focuses on aluminium bending as an efficient means of fabrication, and describes the most common methods of bending.

results.title: Machine operation
results.creator_credit: De Frenes and United States. Navy
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic typing”.
Demonstrates correct stroking at speeds ranging from 35 to 180 words per minute. Explains the functions of the various parts of the typewriter and demonstrates the use of these on various types of machines. Demonstrates how to attain correct touch for noiseless, manual, and electric machines.
results.description:

results.title: Methods
results.creator_credit: De Frenes and United States. Navy
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Basic typing”.
Demonstrates the correct posture for typing and proper fingering of the keys; shows the use of the shift key, back spaces, tabulator, carriage return lever, and other parts on both manual and electric machines; also discusses the funtion of various fixtures on the machine. Correct use of single sheets and carbon pack is also demonstrated, together with the use of the paper lever and carriage release lever.
